title: 3v3 and Dominion
body:
Just a quick one, and if this is already been announced somewhere and I missed it, I apologise.

Anyway, just wanted to know if the OCE server is ever going to get 3v3 and dominion, (and I mean available all the time) ????

I realise they aren't all that popular, I didn't really play much of them either when I was on NA, but it was nice having them available when I just wanted a quick game of something different

replies.body: On NA, the 3v3 and Dominion game modes are riddled with bots... Literally Co-Op v.s. AI style bots. Fake accounts created by Riot so that people can actually play these game modes. I have a feeling that judging from these events on the NA server, 3v3 and Dominion probably won't be coming to OCE servers.

This has been asked repeatedly, and to the best of my knowledge the stance hasn't changed. Something along the lines of not enough people on OCE to make it worth it, and not enough interest in the people that are.
However, as far as I know, they haven't said anything since, despite numerous people asking, which is suspicious to me. We haven't even recieved an update on how many more people would be needed, we've literally been given nothing.
